name: zeropoint-protocol
description: Zeropoint Protocol Dual Consensus Agentic AI Platform

scripts.predeploy:inject: BUILD_SHA=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) BUILD_TIME=$(date -u +"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ") && sed -i '' -e "s/__BUILD_SHA__/${BUILD_SHA}/g" -e "s/__BUILD_TIME__/${BUILD_TIME}/g" public/evidence/v19/index.html public/status/version/index.html public/status/ready/index.html
scripts.evidence:publish: git add public/evidence/phase5 evidence/phase5 && git commit -m "[SONIC-MAX][PHASE5] publish evidence"
